hero_news.title: DeepMind Unveils AlphaGenome: AI Breakthrough in DNA Analysis
hero_news.summary: Google's DeepMind has formally unveiled AlphaGenome, an advanced AI designed to analyze long stretches of DNA. It predicts how genetic variants influence gene regulation, promising to accelerate genomics research and new medicine production.
